website_summaries.verdict: EGO’s most affordable hedge trimmer is an excellent deal due to its durability, lightning-quick charge time, and impressively strong cutting.
cons: You’ll feel its 6-pound weight after a few minutes

customer_reviews.title: It cut through thick brush like nothing! Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful trimmer on battery so no need to mess with motor! I used it several time on the hunting lease and it worked really well for what I needed it for, which is to trim down the brush around my feeder and blind. It cut through thick brush like nothing! Very impressed! The batter pack is great switching between my Ego weed-eater and 14" chain saw.
customer_reviews.author: Shyuemin Pang

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: We have found this to be an excellent, versatile, and useful tool. The battery is fully powered and easy to charge. This is obviously heavier than your typical trimmer, because of the battery. But if you are strong enough to hold and manipulate it, this is very good—even if a lot more expensive than electric trimmers. One thing you can't do is use it with only one hand.
customer_reviews.author: PogeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, lightweight, and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This hedge trimmer is great. Previously I had an electric hedge trimmer with a power cord. It was eco friendly, but the maneuverability was terrible. I really enjoy using this device.
customer_reviews.author: NGDiggs

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful ran this trimer for 4-5 hours cutting though thick twigs and it still had battery life. Unit is very heavy with the 56 volt battery not able to use the trimmer using 1 hand. I’m not a weak guy. I still would recommend this trimmer not having to dealing with a cord made this trimmer a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore j.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this trimmer. It is easy to use and does the job well! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Best tools ever!
customer_reviews.text: I own everything other then the chainsaw which is next on my shopping list! Awesome product line
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I don't have large jobs for this device, just smaller backyard work. It works perfect for me and I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Brin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, good quality and workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, good quality and workmanship. Plenty of power, and light enough my Niece could use it. Only gave 4 stars because of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: G. D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Power to spare
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer is the best! It has power to spare and the batteries last a long time before needing a recharge. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JAM from NC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Trimmer !!
customer_reviews.text: This could be the best trimmer I've ever used !! I absolutely love how this beast works. I hope you can keep up. Be blessed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cutter easy to use nice reach long battery life
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Porter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent power and the battery lasts a long time. Overall a great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought the hedge clippers and loved them, so I thought that I would try ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the hedge clippers and loved them, so I thought that I would try the blower too. It works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: EGO Power+ HT2400 56V 2.5Ah Lithium-Ion Cordless Hedge Trimmer with Battery & Charger Kit, 24"
product_meta.description: The EGO POWER+ Hedge Trimmer delivers performance equal to or better than many premium gas-powered models without the noise, fuss and fumes. The advanced EGO POWER+ 56V battery uses industry-leading Arc-Lithium technology to deliver Power Beyond Belief and is compatible with all EGO POWER+ products. 24-in. hardened-steel, dual-action, blades and extended reach provide a smooth cut that promotes plant health. 3,000 strokes per minute (spm) -make clean, fast cuts to get the job done faster. All EGO outdoor power equipment comes with a 5-year limited warranty and 3-year limited warranty on EGO POWER+ System battery packs and chargers. Please contact EGO Customer service Toll Free at 1-855-EGO-5656 any time you have questions or warranty claims.
feature_bullets: Up to a 1 hour run time with included battery
Electronic brake stops blade action quickly for improved control

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars34 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
